data.rationale: Phase 3.0 builds on completed foundation (1.x), cartridge memory (2.0), verification intelligence (2.1), and adversarial testing (2.2). Focus areas selected based on: (1) Verification skills have highest ROI - they validate AI outputs creating trust layer, (2) Video editing was explicitly deferred to 3.0, (3) Image generation has rules but no skill, (4) Code workflows are natural extension of design-to-code verifier.
alternatives: Build horizontal platform features instead of vertical skills
Defer to Phase 4 and harden 2.x further
data.context: Current state: 19 skills (15 core, 4 tested), 7 rules, 876 artifacts, 100% embedding coverage. Gaps: no image generation skill, no video skill, no code generation/review skill, limited multi-modal composition.
